backend/main.mo: Defines enums, types, and comparison helpers for clients, tasks, team members, and todos, forming the core data model for the backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence records linking feature requirements to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists high-level summaries of multiple frontend components, hooks, and pages for reference.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend CSS.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React application into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component controlling authentication flow, public search handling, and default dark theme setup.
Dialog form for adding a new client with fields for identifiers, status, categories, and recurring settings.
frontend/src/components/AddTeamMemberDia: Dialog to create a team member by entering a name and principal ID with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/BulkEditClientsD: Dialog for bulk editing client fields such as status, task category, and recurring settings, then submitting updates via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/BulkEditTasksDia: Dialog enabling batch updates to multiple task attributes, including status, comments, assignment, dates, billing, and captains, with validation and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/BulkImportDialog: Dialog for importing clients from CSV or Excel, parsing data into preview entries and submitting them through a bulk‑import mutation.
frontend/src/components/BulkImportTasksD: Dialog handling Excel-based task import with preview, validation of fields, and construction of task objects for bulk upload.
frontend/src/components/BulkImportTeamMe: Dialog for uploading and parsing Excel files to create new team members, generating principals and submitting them via bulk import.
frontend/src/components/CaptainsMultiSel: Provides a searchable popover-based multi-select UI for choosing multiple team members as captains, showing selected items as removable badges.
frontend/src/components/ClientTable.tsx: Renders a client list table with admin-only bulk actions, per-client edit/view/delete options, and selection state management.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: Dialog for creating tasks, handling form inputs, validation, date conversions, captain selection, and submission via createTask API.
frontend/src/components/DueDateDetailMod: Displays tasks filtered by due-date type with status badges and supports exporting the listed tasks to Excel.
frontend/src/components/EditClientDialog: Dialog for editing client details with form bindings, validation, and update submission via updateClient API.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog component for editing task details, handling form state, field updates, and date conversions, and submitting updates via useUpdateTask.
frontend/src/components/MainLayout.tsx: Main application layout with a sidebar, navigation, and page routing for dashboard, clients, tasks, todo, and team pages.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter their name and save their profile using useSaveCallerUserProfile.
frontend/src/components/public-search/Te: Sortable, selectable tasks table for public search showing team member assignments, statuses, and export options.
frontend/src/components/RevenueDetailMod: Modal displaying detailed revenue data with sorting, payment status indicators, and content fetched via useGetRevenueModalData.
frontend/src/components/SearchableAssign: Popover-based searchable dropdown for selecting a team member by filtering and choosing from a list.
frontend/src/components/TaskList.tsx: Task table with sorting, selection, comment editing, task deletion, and dialogs for editing tasks and viewing client tasks.
frontend/src/components/ViewClientTasksD: Dialog component that displays a table of tasks filtered by client with status, type, due date, and payment badges.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity handling login, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profiles, admin checks, and public search endpoints.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with extensive light/dark theme tokens and color system definitions.
frontend/src/lib/excelTemplates.ts: Provides CSV parsing and functions to generate and download client/task import templates.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: Displays searchable client list with admin actions for adding and bulk importing clients.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders dashboard metrics for clients, tasks, and revenue with export and filtering options.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Presents login UI using Internet Identity with navigation to public search.
frontend/src/pages/PublicSearchPage.tsx: Enables public search of team members, clients, and tasks with sorting and export features.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Task management page with filtering, date search, bulk actions, and export/import support.
frontend/src/pages/TeamPage.tsx: Displays team members and provides admin tools to add or bulk import new members.
frontend/src/pages/ToDoPage.tsx: Manages user to-dos with add, edit, delete, filter, and export features.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Formatting helpers for dates, placeholders, and optional text fields.
frontend/src/utils/taskStatus.ts: Defines task status order, labels, options, and comparison logic for sorting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and managing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, shadows, typography, and container settings.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s current dark blue theming initiative, listing existing theme-related features and a pending new feature request. Contains project metadata, state versioning, and empty notes/issue sections.
